mapper.update:
update person_checkname
PCN_RELNAME = #{pcnRelname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PCN_IDNUMBER = #{pcnIdnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PCN_FRONTID = #{pcnFrontid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PCN_REVERSEID = #{pcnReverseid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PCN_INTRODUCE = #{pcnIntroduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PCN_CREATETIME = #{pcnCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PCN_STATE = #{pcnState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PCN_COMMENT = #{pcnComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where LOG_ID = #{logId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: PCN_ID, PCN_RELNAME, PCN_IDNUMBER, PCN_FRONTID, PCN_REVERSEID, PCN_INTRODUCE, LOG_ID, PCN_CREATETIME, PCN_STATE, PCN_COMMENT
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(PCN_IDNUMBER) FROM person_checkname WHERE PCN_IDNUMBER = #{pcnIdnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (PCN_STATE=1 OR PCN_STATE=2)
mapper.insert: insert into person_checkname (PCN_ID, PCN_RELNAME, PCN_IDNUMBER, PCN_FRONTID, PCN_REVERSEID, PCN_INTRODUCE, LOG_ID, PCN_CREATETIME, PCN_STATE, PCN_COMMENT) values (#{pcnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcnRelname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcnIdnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcnFrontid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcnReverseid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcnIntroduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcnCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pcnState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pcnComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
